official_title: To amend the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act of 1965 to authorize the National Endowment for the Arts to assist States, local governments and private groups identify and prepare comprehensive plans to recognize and to encourage the wise and appropriate future use of significant American landscapes, and for other purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

summary.text: Great American Landscapes Act of 1990 - Amends the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act of 1965 to direct the Chairman of the National Endowment for the Arts to make competitive matching grants to States for statewide landscape assessments and to States, local governments, and private groups for individual comprehensive landscape plans. Requires biennial reports to the Congress on such grants program. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To amend the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act of 1965 to authorize the National Endowment for the Arts to assist States, local governments and private groups identify and prepare comprehensive plans to recognize and to encourage the wise and appropriate future use of significant American landscapes, and for other purposes.
